This subordinate status must be reflected in the corporate systems.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Managers take care of their units by leading them towards and enabling their achievement of business goals. RM activities cover core areas, such as people management, unit development, participation in project supervision. Resource Managers fulfil a wide range of responsibilities and range of responsibilities depends on the RM level and number of subordinates.
